system.description:
At 6th level, you become a full Proscriber, and receive additional training. Choose four spells from the knowledge school of a level you can cast and add them to your spellbook. All future knowledge spells you add to your spellbook are added at 25% of the usual cost in both time and materials. Spells of the knowledge school are always wizard spells for you, though other wizards cannot learn them from you unless they normally appear on the wizard list.

You also gain an exertion pool with 3 points of exertion in it, or, if you already have an exertion pool, it increases by 3 points. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-maneuvers.Item.e2k7hxnsl3sdrldt]{Purge Magic} maneuver. If you already know it, you may choose another 1st-degree maneuver from the Tempered Iron school or from another combat tradition that utilizes or nullifies magic.
